text.section:
Each commissioner, the executive director, and each employee of an authority is:
a local official for the purposes of Title 15, Subtitle 8, Part I of the State Government Article and subject to local ethics laws; and
an employee of a local government for the purposes of Title 5, Subtitle 3 of the Courts and Judicial Proceedings Article and entitled to the protections of the Local Government Tort Claims Act.
A commissioner of an authority is not liable for a statement made or action taken in good faith in the exercise or performance of a power or duty of the commissioner.
